name: Little Home Maker
description:
In 1659 A.M, Noah saved a male and a female of each animal alive. Those who were left looked for a safe spot, but only a few were successful. Our hero Little Blue and other ones settled themselves in a cave but finding a place wasn't enough. Stress was accumulating, food was hard to find and the loved ones went missing. It was hard to everyone but Little Blue was ready to help them feel at home. But the question is, what is home for them?

  • WASD or Arrows to move.
  • Spacekey to Jump.
  • Right Mouse Click when you have water to do some magic stuff.

#GGJ2019
